Title: Private tokens could appear in logs if context containing gRPC metadata is logged in github.com/grpc/grpc-go
Description: This issue represents a potential PII concern.  If applications were printing or logging a context containing gRPC metadata, the affected versions will contain all the metadata, which may include private information.
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 1.64.0 before 1.64.1, version 1.64.0
